>   OOC: Arn't we still submerged in molton hot magma?

Last I heard you were. Nightrazor fought with the computers to keep you
guys above the magma so he could escape. But I believe after that
Perceptor was able to get through and re-sink you guys. You should be
toastee warm beneath the rather Hot Magma. 

 . . .  Unless something happened that I missed :)
